resources.string:
"SafeDisk instructions：

"
"Registered your usb pen drive

" "when you open this app then you can‵t see any deta show on your view,you moster to be registered usb pen drive on the safeDisk web.

"
"Select the device you want to turn on

"
"Connect the usb pen drive you want to use to your computer.On the app, you will see your usb pen drive, you can select one drive you want to turn on.

"
"Click the button for the name of the usb pen drive

"
"Done not require any complicated actions or even memory password, just click on it, then app will get bluetooth connect and turn on the lock, then the usb pen drive will work properly.

"
"Enjoy to use it.

"
"Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
